column4: weird.. karmic found my screen automatically.. reinstalled with maveric, and only get 1024x768 on part of screen and no recognized screen.. any help appreciated
Intel drivers are included with OS. Everything should work. Problem is with limited resolution?
yep.. System->Preference->Monitors shows no recognized monitors.. so I cannot set it to 1920x1200 or whatever
we are talking about a laptop right... you can't set resolution to external monitor or built-in?
yes, laptop. external monitor.. benq 24". laptop is in dockingstation with lid/screen down
is picture on both screens on?
I thought it wasn't. but I opened the lid/screen and now have mirrored screens
there in lies your problem... on your laptop there should be function key to switch completely to external display... then resolution will be ok
Fn-F8 you mean? seems it doesn't want to jump to external only..
try few times as it cycles trough modes...
nopes.. I'll try restarting on misc level
nope what? sorry problems tracking everything :D
no changes even with rebooting with both screens up. with karmic it found both screens and I could disable one of them if I liked to. now it only find 1 screen but its undetected
and Fn-F8 one or more tries doesn't work either
and the function key is not working?
you got me stuck. :)... problem with resolution is that screens are in mirror mode and max resolution represents max resolution of your laptop monitor
